Queries.Query: Select Distinct top {0} rh.RunName, (Select count(*) from ScenarioHeader where RunHeaderID = rh.RunHeaderID and ScenarioRunStatus = 'Completed Sucessfully' ) Passed, (Select count(*) from ScenarioHeader where RunHeaderID = rh.RunHeaderID and ScenarioRunStatus = 'Completed With Errors' ) Failed, CAST((DATEDIFF(MINUTE,rh.StartTime,rh.CompletedTime)/60.00)AS DECIMAL(10,2)) TimeTaken, rh.RunHeaderID from runheader rh Join ScenarioHeader sh on rh.RunHeaderID = sh.RunHeaderID where rh.runname like '{1}%' and rh.site like '%{2}%' Order by rh.RunHeaderID desc

Select sh.ScenarioName, sh.ModuleName, CAST((DATEDIFF(MINUTE,sh.StartTime,sh.CompletedTime)/60.00)AS DECIMAL(10,2)) TimeTakenInMinutes from ScenarioHeader Sh join RunHeader rh on sh.RunHeaderID = rh.RunHeaderID where rh.RunName='{0}' And sh.ScenarioRunStatus = 'Completed with errors'

Select SH.scenarioHeaderId,Sh.ScenarioName,Sh.ModuleName,Sh.ScenarioRunStatus, sd.LogType,sd.data from ScenarioDetail SD Join ScenarioHeader SH on SD.ScenarioHeaderID = SH.ScenarioHeaderID Join RunHeader RH on RH.RunHeaderID=SH.RunHeaderID WHere rh.RunName='{0}' and sd.category not in ('Dump','Datasets') order by sd.scenarioDetailId desc
